text: Andreas Antonius Maria "Dries" van Agt (;van in isolation: . 2 February 1931 â€“ 5 February 2024) was a Dutch politician of the Christian Democratic Appeal (CDA). He served as Prime Minister of the Netherlands from 19 December 1977, until 4 November 1982. Dries van Agt (1931), Absolutefacts.nl, 10 December 2008 Van Agt and his wife died through euthanasia on 5 February 2024, three days after his 93rd birthday. Van Agt had health problems caused by a brain hemorrhage in 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mr. A.A.M.
